name: Toxic
description:
Made for Procjam 2018, Toxic features a procedurally generated world. Your aim is to get to a destination, guided by your compass. Watch your altitude though, high mountains bring fresh air!

Credit to Sebastian Lague for great tutorials on procedural terrain generation: https://goo.gl/UkuLqi

Controls:

Move - WASD

Look - Mouse

Jump - Space
